alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison; Richland (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 08 at 4:51PM CST until February 08 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Central Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 545 PM CST. * At 451 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jigger, or 7 miles southwest of Winnsboro, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Winnsboro around 500 PM CST. Crowville around 515 PM CST. Bakers around 525 PM CST. Holly Ridge around 530 PM CST. Delhi around 535 PM CST. Warden, Waverly and Tendal around 540 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gilbert and Baskin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
